topics.body:
If you were sent to any time in the past, what would your fake name be and occupation?
(Note: No being royal or religious, I'm trying to see at normal people level.)

I'd be at the Great Age Of Piracy and act as a scholar or a commander of an armada of ships for the French.
My name would be Francois El-Matyrdom.

(Note: I made that name without thinking.)
